title: Liam Hemsworth and 'Dynasty' actress Maddison Brown spotted kissing in New York
text:
Cape Town – It looks like Liam Hemsworth is ready to move on after his split from Miley Cyrus.

The couple announced their separation in August eight months after they got married.

READ MORE: Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth call it quits months after tying the knot



The 29-year-old who has kept a low profile since the break-up was first spotted out on a date with Dynasty actress Maddison Brown on Thursday in New York.



According to E! News the pair were pictured holding hands as they walked through the West Village, they stopped at Sant Ambroeus coffee bar and then headed to the subway.

We all volunteered as tribute but Maddison Brown won. https://t.co/0683Aiu9nU pic.twitter.com/g7meqJ2tpT — E! News (@enews) October 11, 2019

But the date didn't end there.

They were out and about again in the evening and if pictures are anything to go by Liam seems smitten with the fellow Australian.

According to the DailyMail, the pair had drinks at The Flower Shop bar.

The Independence Day: Resurgence actor and the 22-year-old put on a playful display of affection as they kissed, and hugged, and at one point Liam nuzzled her neck.

EXCLUSIVE: Liam Hemsworth kisses new girlfriend Maddison Brown during romantic date https://t.co/V6iXY0eqgp — Daily Mail Celebrity (@DailyMailCeleb) October 11, 2019

During an interview on the Zach Sang Show in June this year alongside co-star Elizabeth Gillies, Maddison played a game of F, Marry, Kill.



When asked to choose between Hugh Jackman, Margot Robbie and Liam and Chris Hemsworth Maddison said she wants both Hemsworths.

"I'm gonna kill Hugh Jackman, I'm gonna marry Margot Robbie, because I would like to fuck her for life, and then I will fuck the Hemsworth brothers, but at the same time, both of them."

WATCH IT HERE:

(Forward to 6:46)

Compiled by Leandra Engelbrecht. (Sources: E! News, DailyMail, Zach Sang Show)
description: It looks like Liam Hemsworth is ready to move on after his split from Miley Cyrus.
